title: MAKING HER WISH COME TRUE WITH NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS INDUCTION ON THE STREET
description:
Dr. Paret demonstrates how non-verbal hypnosis can help us make our dreams to become true. At his non-verbal hypnosis masterclass, one of his student said she has a wish and Dr. Paret told her to look at her hand. He used Magnetism and she entered in a deep trance state.  After this streethypnosis, the woman wakes up feeling the transformation and the positive energy, she feels that her dream is going to become true, very soon. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
